task.summary: Default task
support livewallpaper tap action and bug fixed.
added support for klwp and changed pkg name.
added support for klwp and changed pkg name.
trying to achieve the google now launcher swipe to left function.
added pixel launcher like search bar.
added pixel launcher like search bar.
added pixel launcher like search bar.
new Icon
added restart option in settings;
more settings added, you can now add notes.

main layout has changed to constrain layout and settings theme optimization, however light and dark theme is disable and forced to light theme and some icon is invisible due to the vector drawable issue but I am trying to find a solution.
Updated minbaractivity interface and quickcenter interface
Updated minbaractivity interface and quickcenter interface + fixed crashes on Android 4.4
Updated minbaractivity interface and quickcenter interface + fixed crashes on Android 4.4 + group item can now be drag out
Updated minbaractivity interface and quickcenter interface + fixed crashes on Android 4.4 + group item can now be drag out
remove nested layout of each app item , replaced by a new custom view, AppItemView
remove nested layout of each app item , replaced by a new custom view, AppItemView
centralised all item view's creation to a single class ItemViewFactory and now support shortcut broadcast event and add shortcut to the home screen
shortcut now are draggable both to the group and from the group
support icon pack!!!
fixed dragging issue on Android 7.1 and modified notes panel and enable to show app label in the dock via settings
fixed dragging issue on Android 7.1 and modified notes panel and enable to show app label in the dock via settings
added a vertical app drawer
added a vertical app drawer + scroll bar + drawer animation improved
added a vertical app drawer + scroll bar + drawer animation improved
bug fix - unable to remove notes.
bug fix - unable to remove notes + notes center changed position
added app search bar for grid/vertical drawer
added app search bar for grid/vertical drawer
the drawer will now rearrange when user hover an app over another app
the drawer will now rearrange when user hover an app over another app
added a new mode for desktop, allowing user to put all the apps in the desktop.
bug fixed
bugs fixed and more settings added + introduced more bugs.
bugs fixed and now the app drawer button can move around
bugs fixed and now the app drawer button can move around
bugs fixed and now the app drawer button can move around
bugs fixed and now the app drawer button can move around
bugs fixed and now the app drawer button can move around
bugs fixed and added a new feature which shows your call history next to the mini nav bar
bugs fixed and added a new feature which shows your call history next to the mini nav bar
bugs fixed and added a new feature which shows your call history next to the mini nav bar
bugs fixed - the drag option panel wrongly shown when toggling the desktop search bar
settings activity optimized.
enable dock color
added app drawer background , label and card color option
bugs fixed : drawer label color not sat
bugs fixed : dock padding error, crash when app uninstalled but still in folder
